#labels libraryreference
=SetAction()=

==Description==
This function sets G15 Cube Servo to run the registered/ pending action


==Include==
G15.h

==Prototype==
static void SetAction(void);


==Parameters==
non


==Returns==
non

==Example==

  
servo1.SetPos(ConvertAngle2Pos(0),iREG_WRITE);    //goto 0 degree pos

    
servo2.SetPos(ConvertAngle2Pos(0),iREG_WRITE);    //goto 0 degree pos 

    
servo1.SetLED(ON, iWRITE_DATA);
 
    
servo2.SetLED(ON, iWRITE_DATA); 

    
delay(1000); 

    
G15::SetAction();


==See Also==
[http://code.google.com/p/cytron-g15-shield/wiki/G15 G15 constructor]
